name: AnimeShow.tv - Anime - Dark Matter
description: Dark theme with sweet accents for AnimeShow.tv Full mobile compatibility, removes intrusive ads, set of sweet wallpapers; or choose your own! you can also choose to show or hide the logo of the site. This style is used best with ghostery + adblockplus

user.name: Rahimichi
user.about:
My user-styles make badly designed websites look better.

So download them and enjoy them, also leave a nice review if possible please.

Message me for any site requests.

additional_info: Version 4.5 Make sure to try my other userstyles: https://userstyles.org/users/299934 If you find any bugs, report it as a question. WANT MORE WALLPAPERS? copy the image addresses from my Imgur Album 1. http://imgur.com/gallery/cjlih
